1. WAP that reads a number in meters, converts it to feet, and displays the result. (A)
2. Perform Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication and Division of 2 numbers as per user's choice. (A)
3. WAP to read marks of five subjects calculate total and percentage. (A)
4. Convert seconds into hours, minutes & seconds and print in HH:MM:SS. [e.g. 10000 seconds = 02:46:40)] (B)
